notes.body: Hello Shubham,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #658472556367101952-12890, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order has been dispatched and is in transit. Please note that it will be delivered between 15 Dec 2025 and 17 Dec 2025. We have recorded the details of your experience, and PharmEasy will take appropriate actions to prevent similar situations in the future. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again.     If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Shubham,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658472556367101952-12890, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order has been dispatched and is in transit. Please note that it will be delivered between 15 Dec 2025 and 17 Dec 2025. We have recorded the details of your experience, and PharmEasy will take appropriate actions to prevent similar situations in the future. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again.

If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Here’s where to invest in AI — and it’s not just LLMs


With artificial intelligence evolving at warp speed, betting on its future can 
feel both exciting and perilous.



Mega-cap tech companies 
<https://urldefense.com/v3/__https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-12-03/tech-is-getting-left-behind-in-the-s-p-500-s-latest-rebound__;!!PUkdKKdW7rI!f0W7jpI4ofRv4T5v0qFufWYwEigoSUnoMqg-eM3a_F8UCznz0bPK4onZ79ZU521U8RMgk9_jIR20GsMY-S7S35DPeHA1OBgj$ >

almost 8%. The dollars flowing into thedata center buildout 
<https://urldefense.com/v3/__https://www.bloomberg.com/explainers/how-to-invest-in-ai-data-center-boom-reits-etfs-power__;!!PUkdKKdW7rI!f0W7jpI4ofRv4T5v0qFufWYwEigoSUnoMqg-eM3a_F8UCznz0bPK4onZ79ZU521U8RMgk9_jIR20GsMY-S7S35DPeA8YBa84$ >

Here’s where to invest in AI — and it’s not just LLMs
Here’s where to invest in AI — and it’s not just LLMs
With artificial intelligence evolving at warp speed, betting on its future can feel both exciting and perilous.
 
Mega-cap tech companies riding the AI boom make up some 36% of the S&P 500, with Nvidia accounting for almost 8%. The dollars flowing into the data center buildout are so huge they’re providing a significant boost to the US economy. Meanwhile, AI is sparking worries about the demand for electricity and water near data centers.

For guidance on how to turn AI’s promise into profit, Bloomberg turned to four experts in the field, including Ark Invest’s Cathie Wood. They see opportunities ranging from identifying gene mutations to making robotaxis safer and faster.

notes.body: Hello Preethish,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern is in regards to your order #657392059988480000-47366. I am sorry to inform you we are unable to change the patient's name on the invoice since there was no valid prescription uploaded for your order. Also, the said medicine does not require a valid prescription. Therefore, we are unable to comply with your request to modify the invoice.     Please be informed for non-prescription medicines/products, the invoice is prepared as per the profile name mentioned at the time of placing the order. If the prescription is uploaded for non-prescription medicines/products, the invoice will be prepared as per the uploaded prescription.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  Tahera
